title: Mediterranean roast chicken salad
ingredients: ['400g conchiglie (pasta shells)', '300g sugarsnap peas, trimmed and halved diagonally', '3 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil', '400g skinless roast chicken meat, torn into bite-sized pieces', '125g rocket', '1 tbsp balsamic vinegar', '225g black or red seedless grapes, halved', '3 tbsp chopped fresh mint', '100g feta cheese, drained if necessary']
